1602216000.title: Asia Capital Connection – 2nd Hour
1602216000.descr: Hosted by Matthew Taylor at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Hadley Gamble at Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), ?Capital Connection? gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

1602219600.title: Europe Squawk Box
1602219600.descr: Anchored by Geoff Cutmore, Steve Sedgwick and Karen Tso, CNBC?s flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. Featuring leading business executives, financial strategists and fund managers, ?Squawk Box? provides original points of view and instant analysis of the latest business and market news.

1602230400.title: Europe Street Signs
1602230400.descr: Street Signs provides CNBC's viewers with the latest updates on business all over the globe. The program focuses on the day's market action, presents perspectives by prominent analysts, investors, executives and business sharks. Track the stock market openings, be the first to get the real-time insights and current view of stocks, take a chance to capitalize on the plays of the day.

1602234000.title: US Worldwide Exchange – Part 1
1602234000.descr: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC?s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Brian Sullivan, the program prepares CNBC's worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

1602235800.title: US Worldwide Exchange – Part 2
1602235800.descr: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC?s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Brian Sullivan, the program prepares CNBC's worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

1602237600.title: US Squawk Box – 1st Hour Part 1
1602237600.descr: ?Squawk Box? is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. Anchored by Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin, the show brings Wall Street to Main Street. It's a must-see for everyone from the professional trader to the casual investor.

1602248400.title: US Squawk on the Street – 1st Hour Part 1
1602248400.descr: Broadcast live from the New York Stock Exchange, join presenters Carl Quintanilla, David Faber, Jim Cramer and Sara Eisen as they introduce the day's trading. The team attempt to make sense of the squawking that the stock exchange is famed for, as they take viewers to the desks where the biggest companies do business. Not to be missed for aspiring investors or anyone interested in trade.

1602250200.descr: Broadcast live from the New York Stock Exchange, join presenters Carl Quintanilla, David Faber, Jim Cramer and Sara Eisen as they introduce the day's trading. 1602255600.title: US Squawk Alley – Part 1
1602255600.descr: Airing live from the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), ?Squawk Alley? is the destination for news regarding tech on CNBC. From prominent names in the Venture Capital world to executives from tech companies and disrupters that are reshaping how the world operates, you will hear the news here first.

1602257400.title: US Squawk Alley – Part 2
1602257400.descr: Airing live from the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), ?Squawk Alley? is the destination for news regarding tech on CNBC. From prominent names in the Venture Capital world to executives from tech companies and disrupters that are reshaping how the world operates, you will hear the news here first.

1602259200.title: US Halftime Report – Part 1
1602259200.descr: "Fast Money Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC?s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

1602261000.title: US Halftime Report – Part 2
1602261000.descr: "Fast Money Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC?s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

1602262800.title: US the Exchange – Part 1
1602262800.descr: CNBC?s ?The Exchange? is the newsroom-based program for today?s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today?s markets and investors. CNBC?s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

1602264600.title: US the Exchange – Part 2
1602264600.descr: CNBC?s ?The Exchange? is the newsroom-based program for today?s Investor. 1602266400.title: US Power Lunch – 2nd Hour Part 1
1602266400.descr: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen, Melissa Lee and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day?s agenda. Airing CNBC?s award-winning business news coverage, ?Power Lunch? delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

1602268200.title: US Power Lunch – 2nd Hour Part 2
1602268200.descr: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen, Melissa Lee and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day?s agenda. Airing CNBC?s award-winning business news coverage, ?Power Lunch? delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

1602270000.title: US Closing Bell – 1st Hour Part 1
1602270000.descr: CNBC's ?Closing Bell? guides you through the most important hour of the trading day by taking a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what's driving them and how investors are reacting. Tune in to watch analysts, money managers and CEOs explain their strategies, and gain access to instant analyses of corporate profit reports as soon as they break.

1602271800.title: US Closing Bell – 1st Hour Part 2
1602271800.descr: CNBC's ?Closing Bell? guides you through the most important hour of the trading day by taking a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what's driving them and how investors are reacting. 1602275400.title: US Closing Bell – 2nd Hour Part 2

1602277200.title: Finding Solutions: Paul Polman & Caroline Casey
1602277200.descr: CNBC's magazine explores issues considering racial equality, work diversity and inclusion all over the world. The programme brings the latest news stories dealing with these serious themes. It also includes experts' debates on these problems, as they try to come up with the best possible solutions for them.

1602279000.title: CNBC Conversation: Gra?a Machel
1602279000.descr: The CNBC Conversation is a series of in-dept interviews with various influential individuals, including politicians, businessmen and entertainers. Join to hear them share opinions on different subjects and talk about their work and careers.

1602280800.title: Managing Asia
1602280800.descr: Managing Asia is a series of in-depth conversations with some of the most influential business leaders in Asia today, who are changing the business landscape on the continent. Join host Christine Tan, as she interviews CEOs and entrepreneurs about various issues, as well as their professional inspirations and goals.

1602282600.title: Nbc Nightly News
1602282600.descr: Join American journalist Lester Holt as he provides a comprehensive report on the latest national and international stories, featuring interviews with the relevant persons involved in the day's news. Nightly News also features a segment titled Making a Difference, where we celebrate ordinary Americans doing extraordinary deeds to benefit their surrounding local communities.

1602284400.title: US Closing Bell (repeat)hrs
1602284400.descr: Hosted by Sara Eisen and Wilfred Frost, Closing Bell brings you coverage of the final and most important hour of the trading day. The show provides insight to traders and investors by interviewing experts, CEOs and analysts, listening to their observations on the movements in the market. With live reports from stock exchanges across the USA, aspiring investors are given an informative platform from which to make informed and sensible decisions.

1602291600.title: Managing Asia
1602291600.descr: Managing Asia is a series of in-depth conversations with some of the most influential business leaders in Asia today, who are changing the business landscape on the continent. Join host Christine Tan, as she interviews CEOs and entrepreneurs about various issues, as well as their professional inspirations and goals.

1602293400.title: CNBC Meets
1602293400.descr: Tania Bryer sits down with some of the most powerful and recognisable names in the world. Featuring guests from a diverse range of industries, Tania discusses both their professional and personal lives, revealing the people behind the names. Whether from the worlds of business, sport, entertainment or politics, the guests reveal the highs and lows of their respective careers, also expanding on their philanthropic ventures.

1602295200.title: CNBC Conversation: Gra?a Machel
